pullRequest.title: (0.20.0) CPU cache line size for Linux AArch64
pullRequest.bodyText:
This commit adds code to j9sysinfo_get_cache_info() so that Linux
AArch64 systems can answer the L1 data cache line size.
Signed-off-by: KONNO Kazuhiro konno@jp.ibm.com

nodes.bodyText: Why is the formatting here different than the PR for master?   Please also port 078394b over so this code exactly matches the master version

commit.message:
(0.20.0) CPU cache line size for Linux AArch64

This commit adds code to j9sysinfo_get_cache_info() so that Linux
AArch64 systems can answer the L1 data cache line size.

Signed-off-by: KONNO Kazuhiro <konno@jp.ibm.com>
